record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 1108
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 1108 -- (House of Representatives - April 02, 2008)

[Page: H1904]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that my name be withdrawn as a cosponsor of H.R. 1108.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Pennsylvania?
